com.gv.cataloguer.controllers

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gv.cataloguer.controllers.MainController

  • public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a controller class, which is used to bind gui and business logic according MVC pattern. Controller for the view represented in main.fxml file

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNewResource(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      opens resource in users desktop and checks users permission on adding new resources, after that if permissions are correspond adds new resource to remote and local catalog
      void deleteSelectedResource(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      deletes resource from remote, local catalogs and from list of references according reference object and selected category
      void logout(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      returns user to the form page with authentication procedure
      void searchResources(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      gets input text pattern form searchField object and find all references that correspond to it, after that sets found references to the treeTableVies object
      void selectCategory(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      handles users mouse click on list of categories and sets references of selected category in treeTableView object
      void suggestResource(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      opens resource from users desktop and after that initiate executing thread that sends to the admin's email suggesting resource
      void updateCatalogFromRemoteDatabase(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      initiate executing thread, that synchronizes resources from remote data storage with resources in local catalog

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
